entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Ulukhaktok
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:28 AM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -17.1°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow late this morning and this afternoon. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 17. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Blizzard. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning then blizzard. Blowing snow. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Blizzard. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 17. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023
